alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Kemper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 13 at 3:32PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding is ongoing due to heavy rainfall from earlier thunderstorms. * WHERE...Portions of central Mississippi, east central Mississippi and northeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in central Mississippi, Attala and Choctaw. In east central Mississippi, Kemper, Neshoba, Noxubee and Winston. In northeast Mississippi, Lowndes and Oktibbeha. * WHEN...Until 315 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM CDT, emergency managers reported flooding due to heavy rain caused by earlier thunderstorms in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 6 and 12 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that are experiencing flooding include... Starkville, Louisville, Macon, Ackerman, De Kalb, Brooksville, Scooba, Crawford, Shuqualak, Noxapater, Weir, Artesia, Longview, Sturgis, Mccool, Porterville, Mashulaville, Millcreek, Gholson and Betheden. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Please adhere to all road closures. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
